channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated servers] - 45D24
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 3, 22:00 UTC  -  Apr 6, 04:00 UTC

Mar 18, 01:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/04/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated servers] - 50C19
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 27, 22:00 UTC  -  Mar 30, 04:00 UTC

Mar 18, 01:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/03/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 30/03/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable during operations (30 minutes per server).
Service improvement : Following the failure of an altigo (power supply and server reboot equipment) for which we have no spare, we have to relocate the servers to a compatible rack.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G118B04
item.description:
Mar 22, 11:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 22/03/2022 10:15 UTC
End Time : 22/03/2022 11:23 UTC
Service impact : All the servers in the G118B04 rack are reachable

Mar 22, 10:51 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 22/03/2022 10:15 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack G118B04 are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - GRA0316A03C
item.description:
Mar 22, 10:49 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 11, 19:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/03/2022 16:53 UTC
Service impact : Servers are unreachable
Root cause : Hardware issue
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 41G05
item.description:
Mar 22, 08:49 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 22/03/2022 08:29 UTC
End Time : 22/03/2022 08:49 UTC
Service impact : We have observed an unavailability of 23 servers in rack 41G05
Root cause : Servers had an electrical failure due to human error

item.title: [BHS1/GRA2/RBX1/ERI1][Dedicated servers] - Upgrade RTvRack
item.description:
Mar 22, 07:37 UTC
Completed - Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention.
We do not have a date scheduled yet.
We will inform you with the publication of a new task.
With apologies for the inconvenience caused

Mar 16, 08:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 22/03/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In regard to our lifecycle management, we need to upgrade all RTvRack exchanger to a new version in order to have a homogeneous park.

item.title: [GRA2/BHS1/ERI1][RtvRack] - Upgrade xDC/xBU
item.description:
Mar 22, 01:54 UTC
Completed - Update: This operation has been postponed to a new date that you will be informed of.

Mar 21, 08:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 16, 05:43 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G118B04
item.description:
Mar 22, 00:18 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 21/03/2022 18:00 UTC
End Time : 22/03/2022 00:09 UTC
Service impact : 10 servers were unreachable.
Root cause : An electrical issue in the rack G118B04 caused this incident. The servers are operational reachable again.

Mar 21, 18:48 UTC
Identified - Start time : 21/03/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : 10 servers are unreachable.
Root cause : Electrical issue in the rack
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
